title: MEZZO APARTMENTS 1BEDROOM
posting_body: ['Mezzo', 'Property Address', '3770 University Center Dr', 'Las Vegas, NV, 89119', 'http://mezzo.vegas/su/2dddpk', 'Move-in ready 1 bed and 1 bath units are available right now.', 'Settle into your new 450 Sq.', 'Ft. square foot home in a friendly community with stunning amenities.', "With rents starting at $999.00, these units won't last.", 'Call us to schedule a tour or get started on an application today!', 'Floor Plan Details', 'Name: 1 Bedroom', '1 Bedrooms / 1 Bathrooms', '450 Sq.', 'Ft.', '$999.00 - $1,024.00', 'Community Amenities', 'On-Site Maintenance', 'Pets Allowed', 'Pool', 'Laundry Facilities', 'Shopping Nearby', 'Close to Las Vegas Strip', 'Pet Policy', 'We accept your furry family members.', 'Dogs and cats, up to two pets per household, are welcome.', 'Dog weight limit of 25 lbs at full grown size.', '$200 non-refundable pet fee per pet and $45 per month pet rent per pet.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday - Saturday 8:00 A.M. - 5:00 P.M.', 'Sunday 9:00 A.M. - 4:00 P.M.', 'Property Contact', 'show contact info', 'ADA ACCESSIBLE', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY']
